S.FORM: = Namibia = Gaga kska Meycow ka Namibia, 22 00 S, 17 00 E ka gaga na nniqan. Kana ka knlbangan na o 824,292 sq km(hangan na o Tg34) (knlbanga dxgal o 823,290 sq km, knlbangan qsiya o 1,002 sq km). Kana ka sejiqun o niqan 2,436,469 hiyi. Gaga Windhoek ka pusu alang paru, jiyax 21 idas 3 ka jiyax skrayan klwaan. Manu ka dxgal Namibia ga wada sugan 47.20% ka dxgal qpahan, 8.80% ka dxgal bbuyu, rahuq dxgal do niqan 44% na. Bukung klwaan ta sayang o kiya ka Hage Geingob, pnaah hngkawas2015 idas 3 jiyax 21pnrajing kmlawa klwaan. cinkhulan sa knita' sa brbiru' = Namibia = Na-mi-pi-ya Kunghekwo(kari Ing-kwo:Republic of Namibia), asi thngani Na-mi-pi-ya, gaga mniq mquri gqian hidaw na Kung-he-kwo. Gqian na hidaw o sdalih Ta-si-yang,daya o gaga mlutuc dha ka Sang-pi-ya ni An-ke-ra, hraan hidaw o mlutuc dha ka Po-ca-na, hunac o mssiyaw dh aka Nan-fey,. Ana nanaq saw ini tlutuc ka Na-mi-pi-ya ni Sin-pa-wey o, ida msspaw hmrinas 200m mniq yayung Can-pi-si-he ka dha klwaan nii. Namipiya gaga mniq haypa100m bitaq 2000m kndaya dha, mdngu ni ini hari quyux, nYajetay ni mdka mdngu kkarac. Namipiya ga wada snakan 13 ka singcngcyu ni 50 ka cngfu klealang,pusu dha bi alang ni paru dha bi alang o Unheqe. Babaw mnurux ppais ka Namipiya do, Namipiya o jiyax 21 idas 3 hngkawas 1990 do pnaah knlawa Nanfey murux nanaq da. Hiya o ida nReynhekwo, nTayingkwosey, nFeycowreynmung ni Nankungti cngyueynkwo uri. Namipiya ga ida hiya ka mdngu bi klwaan hunac Feycow Saharasamo, plealay bi mnniq Namipiya o seejiq Sang, seejiq Tamara, seejiq Nama. Yabi kndadax Sci 14 do sneegul knlabang dxgal seejiqPantu,duma na seejiq Pantura ga wada dhuq thjil Namipiya. Paah hiya siida do kska na kingal seejiq Pantu-seejiq Awwanpo o kmlux Namipiya da.paah bukuy Sci 19 do, seejiq Awwanpo ga hiya ka maa hbaraw bi seejiq Namipiya da. Hngkawas 1878 siida, ida nYingkwo na Qaypucminti ka wada mangal Hwaweyswankang ni Ciecyuntaw, hini ga wada maa Nanfey Reynpang pnhiyug 1910 siida kska na hiya uri.Hngkawas 1884 siida, Teyic Tikwo ga hiya ka kmlawa egu bi Namipiya ni ngalan Pawhukwo. Bukuy do, prajing prana pusu bi ssalu ni nungyey Namipiya ka Tekwo,duri ni kmlawa bitaq hngkawas 1915, dhuq ini baka cyuntwey Nanfey ka cyuntwey Tekwo. Wada mnhdu hngkawas 1920 ka Tgkingal ppais ka knglangan do,manu ka Kwoci Reynmung o smruwa ni bqanan dha Nanfey Reynpang ka kmlawa quri saw brah nTekwo na hunac gqian hidaw Feycow.Hunac Feycow ga ga mduuy gaya dha mniq hunac gqian hidaw Feycow, kana ka ddaun pseanak kklgan seejiq ni klgan gygaya. Paah hngkawas 1948 siida, kndadax wada mangal pklawa ka Kwomintang Nanfey do, manu ka Nanfey o mangal pseanak klgan seejiq dha mniq hunac gqian hidaw Feycow siida. Bukuy Sci 20 do,yasa mtutuy ka empruway Cngc ni mririh cngc Namipiya o gisu miying ni kntruxan , kiya ni maku meapa qmlahang hunac gqian hidaw Feycow hngkawas 1966 ka Reyhekwo, kiya ka kiya ni ida Hunac Nanfey ka balay bi kmlawa Namipiya.Hngkawas 1973 do, ida srwaan Reynhekwo mririh seejiq Namipiya ka qpruhan seejiq hunac gqian hidaw Feycow. Tang nii ga ida gaga qlhangan seejiq Awwanpo, seejiq Awwanpo o kika hbaraw bi seejiq Namipiya. Mlutuc bukuy na yowcican do,manu ka Nanfey o hngkawas 1985 siida, mniq Namipiya pnhiyug tnais na singcng tangcyu. Hngkawas 1990 do Namipiya ga balay bi kndadax Hunac Nanfey qulung murux nanaq da.Kiya ka kiya ni bitaq hngkawas 1994 do Hwaweyswankang ni Ciecyuntaw ga, ida klwaan Nanfey han. Namipiya ga niqan 260 kbuhug ka hiyi seejiq na, ida mgdhug ka twotang Yihwey Mincuctu dha.Nungyey, syumuyey, ryuyowyey ni cayqwangyey(kana ka cwans, xiyow,xicin, xiyin ni peyxilung na kmarig) tunan ka pusu cingci dha.Paru nan i mdngu na Nyamipi samo ga skllbu na bi mitu ka hiyi seejiq knglangan Naymipiya klwaan. Ri-s Plealay mnniq mdngu dxgal Naymipiya o seejiq Pusyuman, seejiq Tamara, seejiq Nama. Kungyueyn Sci 14 siida,kndadax ska hunac Feycow thjil na seejiq Pantu ga, niqan cikuh ka gaga mniq Naymipiya saying.Hngkawas 1884 siida, manu ka Tekwo o mluk ssiyaw gsilung hunac gqian hidaw, duri ni gmarang saw hini o cminti dhamsa, nTekwo na Hunac Gqian Hidaw.Hngkawas 1890 siida, wada lkanan Tekwo kana ka Hunac Gqian Hidaw. Da. Hngkawas 1915 tgkingal ppais siida, mneiyah mrmux ka heytay Yingcyun, ini khbaraw na heytay Tekwo ga wada asi ini baka cyuntwey Hunac Feycow,wada ngalan Hunac Feycow duri ka Hunac Gqian Hidaw. Hngkawas 1919 do manu ka Kwoci Reynmung ga wada na pqlhangan Hunac Gqian Hidaw duri ka Hunac Feycow .duri ka.Hngkawas 1949 do manu ka Rishwey Reynhekwo o mneysa Hunac Feycow, pniqi dxgal Reynhekwo twokwan ringti ka Hunac Gqian Hidaw msa,ida ini srwani cngfu Hunac Feycow. Idas 4 hngkawas 1949 do, Yihwey na Hunac Feycow ga, wada smruwa < Hunac Gqian Hidaw swu syowcngfa>,ngalan dha saw ndxgal dha nanaq qmita ka Hunac Gqian Hidaw, kiya ni mdudug uda pseanak kleegan seejiq cngce. Hngkawas 1958 bitaq hngkawas 1964 siida, mqalux seejiq Naymipiya ga mnhiyug Mincu Reynmung Hunac Gqian Hidaw,Jnmincuc Hunac Gqian Hidaw ni Micu cuc Micu tungyi Hunac Gqian Hidaw, Hngkawas1966 siida, prajing tutuy smiyuk yowcucan na klwaan na Hunac Feycow. Idas 6 hngkawas 1968 do, Tahwey na Reynhekwo o wada pprngaw saw pryuxun Naymipiya dungan ka hangan Hunac Gqian Hidaw. Hngkawas 1980 siida smnegul kndudul paru ka nipi Kwoci Sehwey ni kmdudul muda micuhwa ni ktnaan qmita ka kleegan sjiqan,qulung srwaan Hunac Feycow murux nanaq ka Naymipiya d. Jiyax idas 2 hngkawas 1990 do, Naymipiya ga smalu Seynfa dha. Jiyax 21 idas 3 do,manu ka Naymipiya o pgarang saw murux nanaq da, Samu Nucyawma ka tgkingal cungtung dha. Hngkawas 1994 siida, manu ka Hunac Feycow ga bqanan na Naymipiya duri ka Hwaweyswan. Tiri Klgsilung Naymipiya ga niqandgring breenux. Ruwan na ddxgal o ida snslian kska baraw dxgal, bowqax na o haypa 2606m na dgiyaq Purantesan(Brandberg);Kska na kawyueyn o paah daya mquri hunac mlutuc, mslutuc dha samo Namipi, gqian hidaw na o hruan sspriq, hunac o yayung Awranche, hraan hidaw o samo Qarahari. Egu samo ka hunac, egu hruan sspriq ka daya; Pniqan qsiya hngkwasan na yayung o ida ini kpiya,klwaan nii ga ida niqan tnteanaq btunux pungryu ksun. Karac Pusu bi karac Naymipiya o msaw ndngu yajetay, ida mdngu kncilux ni ciway qnuyux; qnyuxan na qsiya kingal hngkwasan o mniq truma 70-100ml. Cngc Cung-tung ka pusu bi mdudul Nay-mi-piya, ida pnsnegaaw sjiqan ka hiya, rima hngkawas do psgaaw txal.Cng-fu o qnpruhan Cung-ri ni ney-ke, cungri o ida snkulan Cungtug. Siida ida pneiyah Na-mi-pi-ya pusu Jen-cu-tang(thnganan qpruhan Nan-fey-jen-min-cuc),ida dha lxanan ka pusu ba lay snhiyan wada Ma-qe-s-cuyi da, kiya ka kina ni ida kiya tgparu bi cng-tang Na-mi-pi-ya ka hiya. Dha na yueyn Na-mi-pi-ya ga ksun ida qnpruhan wey-yueyn-hwey kana klwaan ni kwo-min-hwey-yi .Wey-yueyn-hwey kana klwaan ga niqan 26 tleengan, kng1 wey-yueyn-hwey ti-cyu o pniqan 2 tleengan, kng1 o ga mqpah 6 hngkawas. Kwo-min-hwey-yi o niqan78 tleengan, kska na 72 cng-yueyn ga ida pnesgaagan kana,, rahuq na 6 cng-yueyn do ida snkulan cung-tung kida, kng1 cey o mqpah 5 hngkawas. Kwo-min-hwey-yi o ri-fa-ci-kwan nklwaan, manu ka Wey-yueyn-hwey kana klwaan o ida hbaraw ka mqpah ku-un ksun uri. Tgbowqax bi s-fa ci-kwan o tgbowqax fa-yueyn,fa-kwan o ida cung-tung ka kndadax s-fa c-syun wey-yueyn-hwey hiya smkagul maa ga-kwan. Qtaan ka dha klwaan Fey-cow o, Na-mi-pi-ya ga wana Qa-pu-ri-wey-cyu hiya ka saw mskluuy hari, ida mtna dha kiyig klwaan Po-ca-na saw Fey-cow tnegsdhug hari ka klwaan dha. Sing-cng cyu-hwa Kana ka klwaan o wada sugan 14 sing-cng-cyu : 1. Paru hangan: can-pi-si cyu; pusu alang: Qa-ti-ma-mu-ri-row 2. Paru hangan: Ay-rung-ke cyu: pusu alang: S-wa-qe-pu-mung-te 3. Paru hangan: Ha-ta-pu cyu: pusu alang: Ma-rin-ta-ar 4. Paru hangan: Qa-ra-s cyu; pusu alang: Ci-te-man-s-hu-pu 5. Paru hangan: Tung-qa-wan-ke cyu; pusu alang: Rung-tu 6. Paru hangan: Si-qa-wan-ke cyu; pusu alang: En-qu-rey-en-qu-ru 7. Paru hangan: Hwo-ma-s cyu; pusu alang: Un-he-qe 8. Paru hangan: Quney-ney cyu; pusa alang: Aw-pu-wo 9. Paru hangan: Aw-han-kwey-na cyu; pusu alang: Ay-na-na 10. Paru hangan: Aw-ma-hay-qay cyu; pusu alang: Ke-pa- pi-s 11.Paru hangan: Aw-mu-sa-ti-cyu; pusu alang: U-ta-pi 12. Paru hangan: Aw- sa-na cyu; pusa alang: Aw-sa qa-ti 13. Paru hangan: Aw-si-qe-two cyu; pusu alang: Cu-aey-pu 14. Paru hangan: Aw-cyaw-cung cu-pa cyu; pusa alang: Aw-qa-han-cya Cin-ci Cin-ci na Na-mi-pi-ya ga pusu bi o kika qwang-can, mkarig qwang ga niqan 20% ka ngalan dha kana seangal hini.Pusu bi qwang-can dha o niqan btunux cwan, xiceyn, limuk, xisin, xiyin, xike. xifan, xicu, xiyow, teyn-nan-ci. Na-mi-pi-ya o tg4 Feycow knparu na uxay ppusa klwaan isil psqmaun qwan-wu,tg5 knglangan knparu hmnru xiyow klwaan ni tg2 knparu hmnru xiceyn klwaan. Hngkawas 1997 siida, btunux cwan ganiqan 141kbuhug qe-ra ka hmnru niya. Na-mi-pi-ya ga yabi mdka hari hiyi seejiq o smtama nung-yey, kiya ni asi ka kndadax klwaan isil ka uuqun.Ana nanaq GDP sjiqan o mniq mqrinuc klwaan Fey-cow nangal tnealang na 5 pey, ida nkiya saw mqrinuc bi ka kndusan sjiqan Na-mi-pi-ya,yasa llabang bi nn iqandha ga ungac qqpahun dha, ini bi ktna ka neasug dha ni egu bi nduuy dha ka seejiq klwaan isil. Cin-ci na Na-mi-pi-ya ga msgluban bi dh aka Nan-fey. NTekwo siida ka Hunac Gqian Hidaw Fey-cow ga, cung-tu Tekwo Rin-te-qwey-s-te(von Lindequist)madas 10 miric Qa-ra-qu-ar,bukuy do snegul maa pusu bi kleegan psaan klwaan isil nung-mu-yey Na-mi-pi-ya ti-cyu ka c -kaw-pi ksun, knegu tnabug dha miric Qa-ra-qu-ar hini o tg1 knglangan.Quri saw kung-yey o niqan ka snalu hyhiyi tnabug, qraqil tnabug, snalu qqsurux ni snalu biyuq unuh. Pusu bi maw-yi klwaan o kika Ow-mung ni Amirika. Hngkawas 2004, kana ka mnangal kwo-min Na-mi-pi-ya o 147.6 hpucing mey-yueyn,spngan ka biyax bnrigan ktna seejiq kana ka nangal kwo-min o 7,300 mey-yueyn. Hngkawas 2016, snpngan ungac qpah 28.1%. Mnangal hbangan ryu-yow-yey o mniq kana ka nangal o niqan 10% hari. Hngkawas 2013 do kana ka sntnayan rmigaw sjiqan klwaan isil o niqan 102 kbuhug. Jen-ko ni kari Na-mi-pi-ya ga ida hbaraw bi ka uxay bhgay seejiq(84％), kska na hiya o Aw-wan-po-cu ka hbaraw bi, yabi mdka hari hiyi seejiq, pusu sslian dha o daya ti-cyu hiya.Rahuq na egu hnbragan mqalux seejiq Pan-tu-cu do, ida niqan ka hbaraw hari Qe-yi-sang-cu(Khoisan, saw ka Na-ma-cu ni Pu-si-man-cu), dhiya ga ida mlutuc seejiq tnpusu Nan-fey kana. Qtaan ka seejiq Qe-yi-sang-cu o ida mtna qtaan dha ka seejiq Pan-tu-cu ni seejiq bhgay.Rahuq na do yabi niqan 8% hiyi seejiq ka " seejiq niqan lhang" (Coloureds) ni " seejiq Pa-s-te" . Ida mniqa lutuc dara seejiq He-ran, seejiq Te-kwo, seejiq Ying-kwo,seejiq Fa-kwo uxay uri o seejiq Pu-taw-ya ka pusu bi seejiq bhgay, niqan kana ka hnbragan 8% hiyi seejiq,snpngan nii ga ida ga mniq hunac Sa-ha-ra-sa-mo tg2 parun knlutuc Fe-cow na Na-fey. Hngkawas 2011 hiyi seejiq o yabi 210 kbuhug, knrana na hiyi seejiq o wada niqan hari 0.873%. Manu ka quri saw cung-cyaw o yabi niqan 80-90％ na seejiq ka snhiyi Ci-tu-cyaw, rahuq na seejiq 10-20％ do snhiyi tnalang na snhiyan.Mdka na seejiq Na-mi -pi-ya o mangal kari En-tun-cya ka tg1 dha kari, ida ka kari Nan-fey ka rngagun dha balay kari. Bgura an na seejiq saying do ida ka kari Ying-kwo ka djiyun dha balay sayang.Kari Nan-fey ni kari Ying-kwo o srngaw dha balay mniq trwahan nniqan. Ana nanaq kari Ying-kwo ka kari klwaan, ida skari kari Nan-fey ni kari Te-kwo ka dhiya.Ida Ci-tu- cung-cyaw ka pusu dha bi cung-cyaw ksun, mnu ka snhiyi Ru-te-hwey na seejiq ka hbaraw bi.

= Namibia = Gaga kska Meycow ka Namibia, 22 00 S, 17 00 E ka gaga na nniqan. Kana ka knlbangan na o 824,292 sq km(hangan na o Tg34) (knlbanga dxgal o 823,290 sq km, knlbangan qsiya o 1,002 sq km). Kana ka sejiqon o niqan 2,436,469 hiyi. Gaga Windhoek ka poso alang paro, jiyax 21 idas 3 ka jiyax skrayan klwaan. Mano ka dxgal Namibia ga wada sogan 47.20% ka dxgal qpahan, 8.80% ka dxgal bboyo, rahoq dxgal do niqan 44% na. Bokong klwaan ta sayang o kiya ka Hage Geingob, pnaah hngkawas2015 idas 3 jiyax 21pnrajing kmlawa klwaan. cinkholan sa knita' sa brbiro' = Namibia = Na-mi-pi-ya Konghekwo(kari Ing-kwo:Repoblic of Namibia), asi thngani Na-mi-pi-ya, gaga mniq mqori gqian hidaw na Kong-he-kwo. Gqian na hidaw o sdalih Ta-si-yang,daya o gaga mlotoc dha ka Sang-pi-ya ni An-ke-ra, hraan hidaw o mlotoc dha ka Po-ca-na, honac o mssiyaw dh aka Nan-fey,. Ana nanaq saw ini tlotoc ka Na-mi-pi-ya ni Sin-pa-wey o, ida msspaw hmrinas 200m mniq yayong Can-pi-si-he ka dha klwaan nii. Namipiya gaga mniq haypa100m bitaq 2000m kndaya dha, mdngo ni ini hari qoyox, nYajetay ni mdka mdngo kkarac. Namipiya ga wada snakan 13 ka singcngcyo ni 50 ka cngfo klealang,poso dha bi alang ni paro dha bi alang o Unheqe. Babaw mnorox ppais ka Namipiya do, Namipiya o jiyax 21 idas 3 hngkawas 1990 do pnaah knlawa Nanfey morox nanaq da. Hiya o ida nReynhekwo, nTayingkwosey, nFeycowreynmong ni Nankongti cngyoeynkwo ori. Namipiya ga ida hiya ka mdngo bi klwaan honac Feycow Saharasamo, plealay bi mnniq Namipiya o seejiq Sang, seejiq Tamara, seejiq Nama. Yabi kndadax Sci 14 do sneegol knlabang dxgal seejiqPanto,doma na seejiq Pantora ga wada dhoq thjil Namipiya. Paah hiya siida do kska na kingal seejiq Panto-seejiq Awwanpo o kmlox Namipiya da.paah bokoy Sci 19 do, seejiq Awwanpo ga hiya ka maa hbaraw bi seejiq Namipiya da. Hngkawas 1878 siida, ida nYingkwo na Qaypocminti ka wada mangal Hwaweyswankang ni Ciecyontaw, hini ga wada maa Nanfey Reynpang pnhiyog 1910 siida kska na hiya ori.Hngkawas 1884 siida, Teyic Tikwo ga hiya ka kmlawa ego bi Namipiya ni ngalan Pawhokwo. Bokoy do, prajing prana poso bi ssalo ni nongyey Namipiya ka Tekwo,dori ni kmlawa bitaq hngkawas 1915, dhoq ini baka cyontwey Nanfey ka cyontwey Tekwo. Wada mnhdo hngkawas 1920 ka Tgkingal ppais ka knglangan do,mano ka Kwoci Reynmong o smrowa ni bqanan dha Nanfey Reynpang ka kmlawa qori saw brah nTekwo na honac gqian hidaw Feycow.Honac Feycow ga ga mdooy gaya dha mniq honac gqian hidaw Feycow, kana ka ddaon pseanak kklgan seejiq ni klgan gygaya. Paah hngkawas 1948 siida, kndadax wada mangal pklawa ka Kwomintang Nanfey do, mano ka Nanfey o mangal pseanak klgan seejiq dha mniq honac gqian hidaw Feycow siida. Bokoy Sci 20 do,yasa mtotoy ka emproway Cngc ni mririh cngc Namipiya o giso miying ni kntroxan , kiya ni mako meapa qmlahang honac gqian hidaw Feycow hngkawas 1966 ka Reyhekwo, kiya ka kiya ni ida Honac Nanfey ka balay bi kmlawa Namipiya.Hngkawas 1973 do, ida srwaan Reynhekwo mririh seejiq Namipiya ka qprohan seejiq honac gqian hidaw Feycow. Tang nii ga ida gaga qlhangan seejiq Awwanpo, seejiq Awwanpo o kika hbaraw bi seejiq Namipiya. Mlotoc bokoy na yowcican do,mano ka Nanfey o hngkawas 1985 siida, mniq Namipiya pnhiyog tnais na singcng tangcyo. Hngkawas 1990 do Namipiya ga balay bi kndadax Honac Nanfey qolong morox nanaq da.Kiya ka kiya ni bitaq hngkawas 1994 do Hwaweyswankang ni Ciecyontaw ga, ida klwaan Nanfey han. Namipiya ga niqan 260 kbohog ka hiyi seejiq na, ida mgdhog ka twotang Yihwey Mincocto dha.Nongyey, syomoyey, ryoyowyey ni cayqwangyey(kana ka cwans, xiyow,xicin, xiyin ni peyxilong na kmarig) tonan ka poso cingci dha.Paro nan i mdngo na Nyamipi samo ga skllbo na bi mito ka hiyi seejiq knglangan Naymipiya klwaan. Ri-s Plealay mnniq mdngo dxgal Naymipiya o seejiq Posyoman, seejiq Tamara, seejiq Nama. Kongyoeyn Sci 14 siida,kndadax ska honac Feycow thjil na seejiq Panto ga, niqan cikoh ka gaga mniq Naymipiya saying.Hngkawas 1884 siida, mano ka Tekwo o mlok ssiyaw gsilong honac gqian hidaw, dori ni gmarang saw hini o cminti dhamsa, nTekwo na Honac Gqian Hidaw.Hngkawas 1890 siida, wada lkanan Tekwo kana ka Honac Gqian Hidaw. Da. Hngkawas 1915 tgkingal ppais siida, mneiyah mrmox ka heytay Yingcyon, ini khbaraw na heytay Tekwo ga wada asi ini baka cyontwey Honac Feycow,wada ngalan Honac Feycow dori ka Honac Gqian Hidaw. Hngkawas 1919 do mano ka Kwoci Reynmong ga wada na pqlhangan Honac Gqian Hidaw dori ka Honac Feycow .dori ka.Hngkawas 1949 do mano ka Rishwey Reynhekwo o mneysa Honac Feycow, pniqi dxgal Reynhekwo twokwan ringti ka Honac Gqian Hidaw msa,ida ini srwani cngfo Honac Feycow. Idas 4 hngkawas 1949 do, Yihwey na Honac Feycow ga, wada smrowa < Honac Gqian Hidaw swo syowcngfa>,ngalan dha saw ndxgal dha nanaq qmita ka Honac Gqian Hidaw, kiya ni mdodog oda pseanak kleegan seejiq cngce. Hngkawas 1958 bitaq hngkawas 1964 siida, mqalox seejiq Naymipiya ga mnhiyog Minco Reynmong Honac Gqian Hidaw,Jnmincoc Honac Gqian Hidaw ni Mico coc Mico tongyi Honac Gqian Hidaw, Hngkawas1966 siida, prajing totoy smiyok yowcocan na klwaan na Honac Feycow. Idas 6 hngkawas 1968 do, Tahwey na Reynhekwo o wada pprngaw saw pryoxon Naymipiya dongan ka hangan Honac Gqian Hidaw. Hngkawas 1980 siida smnegol kndodol paro ka nipi Kwoci Sehwey ni kmdodol moda micohwa ni ktnaan qmita ka kleegan sjiqan,qolong srwaan Honac Feycow morox nanaq ka Naymipiya d. Jiyax idas 2 hngkawas 1990 do, Naymipiya ga smalo Seynfa dha. Jiyax 21 idas 3 do,mano ka Naymipiya o pgarang saw morox nanaq da, Samo Nocyawma ka tgkingal congtong dha. Hngkawas 1994 siida, mano ka Honac Feycow ga bqanan na Naymipiya dori ka Hwaweyswan. Tiri Klgsilong Naymipiya ga niqandgring breenox. Rowan na ddxgal o ida snslian kska baraw dxgal, bowqax na o haypa 2606m na dgiyaq Porantesan(Brandberg);Kska na kawyoeyn o paah daya mqori honac mlotoc, mslotoc dha samo Namipi, gqian hidaw na o hroan sspriq, honac o yayong Awranche, hraan hidaw o samo Qarahari. Ego samo ka honac, ego hroan sspriq ka daya; Pniqan qsiya hngkwasan na yayong o ida ini kpiya,klwaan nii ga ida niqan tnteanaq btonox pongryo kson. Karac Poso bi karac Naymipiya o msaw ndngo yajetay, ida mdngo kncilox ni ciway qnoyox; qnyoxan na qsiya kingal hngkwasan o mniq troma 70-100ml. Cngc Cong-tong ka poso bi mdodol Nay-mi-piya, ida pnsnegaaw sjiqan ka hiya, rima hngkawas do psgaaw txal.Cng-fo o qnprohan Cong-ri ni ney-ke, congri o ida snkolan Congtog. Siida ida pneiyah Na-mi-pi-ya poso Jen-co-tang(thnganan qprohan Nan-fey-jen-min-coc),ida dha lxanan ka poso ba lay snhiyan wada Ma-qe-s-coyi da, kiya ka kina ni ida kiya tgparo bi cng-tang Na-mi-pi-ya ka hiya. Dha na yoeyn Na-mi-pi-ya ga kson ida qnprohan wey-yoeyn-hwey kana klwaan ni kwo-min-hwey-yi .Wey-yoeyn-hwey kana klwaan ga niqan 26 tleengan, kng1 wey-yoeyn-hwey ti-cyo o pniqan 2 tleengan, kng1 o ga mqpah 6 hngkawas. Kwo-min-hwey-yi o niqan78 tleengan, kska na 72 cng-yoeyn ga ida pnesgaagan kana,, rahoq na 6 cng-yoeyn do ida snkolan cong-tong kida, kng1 cey o mqpah 5 hngkawas. Kwo-min-hwey-yi o ri-fa-ci-kwan nklwaan, mano ka Wey-yoeyn-hwey kana klwaan o ida hbaraw ka mqpah ko-on kson ori. Tgbowqax bi s-fa ci-kwan o tgbowqax fa-yoeyn,fa-kwan o ida cong-tong ka kndadax s-fa c-syon wey-yoeyn-hwey hiya smkagol maa ga-kwan. Qtaan ka dha klwaan Fey-cow o, Na-mi-pi-ya ga wana Qa-po-ri-wey-cyo hiya ka saw msklooy hari, ida mtna dha kiyig klwaan Po-ca-na saw Fey-cow tnegsdhog hari ka klwaan dha. Sing-cng cyo-hwa Kana ka klwaan o wada sogan 14 sing-cng-cyo : 1. Paro hangan: can-pi-si cyo; poso alang: Qa-ti-ma-mo-ri-row 2. Paro hangan: Ay-rong-ke cyo: poso alang: S-wa-qe-po-mong-te 3. Paro hangan: Ha-ta-po cyo: poso alang: Ma-rin-ta-ar 4. Paro hangan: Qa-ra-s cyo; poso alang: Ci-te-man-s-ho-po 5. Paro hangan: Tong-qa-wan-ke cyo; poso alang: Rong-to 6. Paro hangan: Si-qa-wan-ke cyo; poso alang: En-qo-rey-en-qo-ro 7. Paro hangan: Hwo-ma-s cyo; poso alang: Un-he-qe 8. Paro hangan: Qoney-ney cyo; posa alang: Aw-po-wo 9. Paro hangan: Aw-han-kwey-na cyo; poso alang: Ay-na-na 10. Paro hangan: Aw-ma-hay-qay cyo; poso alang: Ke-pa- pi-s 11.Paro hangan: Aw-mo-sa-ti-cyo; poso alang: U-ta-pi 12. Paro hangan: Aw- sa-na cyo; posa alang: Aw-sa qa-ti 13. Paro hangan: Aw-si-qe-two cyo; poso alang: Co-aey-po 14. Paro hangan: Aw-cyaw-cong co-pa cyo; posa alang: Aw-qa-han-cya Cin-ci Cin-ci na Na-mi-pi-ya ga poso bi o kika qwang-can, mkarig qwang ga niqan 20% ka ngalan dha kana seangal hini.Poso bi qwang-can dha o niqan btonox cwan, xiceyn, limok, xisin, xiyin, xike. xifan, xico, xiyow, teyn-nan-ci. Na-mi-pi-ya o tg4 Feycow knparo na oxay pposa klwaan isil psqmaon qwan-wo,tg5 knglangan knparo hmnro xiyow klwaan ni tg2 knparo hmnro xiceyn klwaan. Hngkawas 1997 siida, btonox cwan ganiqan 141kbohog qe-ra ka hmnro niya. Na-mi-pi-ya ga yabi mdka hari hiyi seejiq o smtama nong-yey, kiya ni asi ka kndadax klwaan isil ka ooqon.Ana nanaq GDP sjiqan o mniq mqrinoc klwaan Fey-cow nangal tnealang na 5 pey, ida nkiya saw mqrinoc bi ka kndosan sjiqan Na-mi-pi-ya,yasa llabang bi nn iqandha ga ongac qqpahon dha, ini bi ktna ka neasog dha ni ego bi ndooy dha ka seejiq klwaan isil. Cin-ci na Na-mi-pi-ya ga msgloban bi dh aka Nan-fey. NTekwo siida ka Honac Gqian Hidaw Fey-cow ga, cong-to Tekwo Rin-te-qwey-s-te(von Lindeqoist)madas 10 miric Qa-ra-qo-ar,bokoy do snegol maa poso bi kleegan psaan klwaan isil nong-mo-yey Na-mi-pi-ya ti-cyo ka c -kaw-pi kson, knego tnabog dha miric Qa-ra-qo-ar hini o tg1 knglangan.Qori saw kong-yey o niqan ka snalo hyhiyi tnabog, qraqil tnabog, snalo qqsorox ni snalo biyoq onoh. Poso bi maw-yi klwaan o kika Ow-mong ni Amirika. Hngkawas 2004, kana ka mnangal kwo-min Na-mi-pi-ya o 147.6 hpocing mey-yoeyn,spngan ka biyax bnrigan ktna seejiq kana ka nangal kwo-min o 7,300 mey-yoeyn. Hngkawas 2016, snpngan ongac qpah 28.1%. Mnangal hbangan ryo-yow-yey o mniq kana ka nangal o niqan 10% hari. Hngkawas 2013 do kana ka sntnayan rmigaw sjiqan klwaan isil o niqan 102 kbohog. Jen-ko ni kari Na-mi-pi-ya ga ida hbaraw bi ka oxay bhgay seejiq(84％), kska na hiya o Aw-wan-po-co ka hbaraw bi, yabi mdka hari hiyi seejiq, poso sslian dha o daya ti-cyo hiya.Rahoq na ego hnbragan mqalox seejiq Pan-to-co do, ida niqan ka hbaraw hari Qe-yi-sang-co(Khoisan, saw ka Na-ma-co ni Po-si-man-co), dhiya ga ida mlotoc seejiq tnposo Nan-fey kana. Qtaan ka seejiq Qe-yi-sang-co o ida mtna qtaan dha ka seejiq Pan-to-co ni seejiq bhgay.Rahoq na do yabi niqan 8% hiyi seejiq ka " seejiq niqan lhang" (Colooreds) ni " seejiq Pa-s-te" . Ida mniqa lotoc dara seejiq He-ran, seejiq Te-kwo, seejiq Ying-kwo,seejiq Fa-kwo oxay ori o seejiq Po-taw-ya ka poso bi seejiq bhgay, niqan kana ka hnbragan 8% hiyi seejiq,snpngan nii ga ida ga mniq honac Sa-ha-ra-sa-mo tg2 paron knlotoc Fe-cow na Na-fey. Hngkawas 2011 hiyi seejiq o yabi 210 kbohog, knrana na hiyi seejiq o wada niqan hari 0.873%. Mano ka qori saw cong-cyaw o yabi niqan 80-90％ na seejiq ka snhiyi Ci-to-cyaw, rahoq na seejiq 10-20％ do snhiyi tnalang na snhiyan.Mdka na seejiq Na-mi -pi-ya o mangal kari En-ton-cya ka tg1 dha kari, ida ka kari Nan-fey ka rngagon dha balay kari. Bgora an na seejiq saying do ida ka kari Ying-kwo ka djiyon dha balay sayang.Kari Nan-fey ni kari Ying-kwo o srngaw dha balay mniq trwahan nniqan. Ana nanaq kari Ying-kwo ka kari klwaan, ida skari kari Nan-fey ni kari Te-kwo ka dhiya.Ida Ci-to- cong-cyaw ka poso dha bi cong-cyaw kson, mno ka snhiyi Ro-te-hwey na seejiq ka hbaraw bi.
